name: mdt
Catchphrase: Test your electronic product at your fingertips
text: During my work-study placement at Exceenis, I had the opportunity to design software for a robotic arm used to test various electronic products. My role included creating a graphic charter and integrating 3D models into an interactive scene.

name: madamepee
text: During my work-study experience at Exceenis, I developed a website listing all female urinals in France. My job was to design and implement this platform, meeting the specific needs of the market with precision and reliability.

name: bolk
Catchphrase: Good food for a healthy body
text: During my work-study experience at Exceenis, I was tasked with designing an interface for an order terminal. This involved creating a custom design, including the choice of colours and typography.

name: lostInChatelet
Catchphrase: Explore Châtelet, the city's lively station! Ready for the challenge of finding your way out on one of our many lines?
text: As part of a school project at HETIC, we are developing a game exclusively in JavaScript. The aim of this initiative is to deepen our understanding of the language and its various aspects.

name: histocom
